The Background of Bishu & 'BXU'

April 7, 2022

The Background of Bishu & 'BXU'

April 7, 2022

Bishu has been a familiar face at Monstercat for years. With a great sense of humour and a charming personality, his music reflects these traits with each release being noticeably different from one another while remaining incredibly catchy. It’s never a dull moment with Bishu, and his music is a testament to that!

December 15, 2022

Announcement

We’re shining the spotlight on the team that makes up Monstercat! Let us meet Inna Sidorova, the Head Of Creative Production at Monstercat.

MONSTERCAT MEETS WITH HELLOWORLD

October 27, 2022

•

Artist Features

The singer-songwriter that’s graced Monstercat with multiple fresh and addicting releases has been rising to the top of everyone’s radar. His unique blend of indie-electronic sounds, pop elements, and nostalgic late 90’s and early 2000’s video game inspirations make for a discography full of surprises. Meet helloworld!

•

Announcement

Presenting a very special Staff Acknowledgement blog post celebrating the career achievements of Daniel Turcotte, Commercial Director at Monstercat!

MIX CONTEST CHAMPIONS DISCUSS THEIR JOURNEYS

September 16, 2022

•

Announcements

The seventh season of Monstercat’s Mix Contest had a big moment: Past Mix Contest winners graced the stage at Monstercat Compound in Vancouver this August! It was a real testament to how these talented DJs and producers making legendary mixes virtually can bring their energy to the live event space with ease. And that’s what the Mix Contest is all about - specifically seeking those Monstercat music aficionados that haven’t been placed on a lineup (yet!) but have the skills to do it.

PEOPLE & CULTURE SERIES: KELSI RING

July 28, 2022

•

Announcement

Kelsi Ring, Head of Communications at Monstercat, is the driving force behind telling Monstercat’s story to the world. Describing the music that’s released, crafting ideas and ways to inform people of what Monstercat’s up to, and celebrating the label’s achievements are just a few of the many ways she helps build Monstercat’s story. So get to know the ultimate communicator!
